questions.question_text: Which is NOT a purpose of the Process Reference Model?

discussion.content:
Duplication with question #12. Should be answer A
A. Forms the basis of a process capability assessment for the Capability Dimension

choices.B: Provides the mechanism whereby defined Process Assessment Models era related measurement framework
choices.A: Forms the basis of a process capability assessment for the Capability Dimension
choices.D: Provides the basis to undertake an assessment on the process dimension
choices.C: Provides the basis for one or more Process Assessment Models

questions.question_text: What item is generated by Business processes as the first stage of the Information Cycle?

choices.D: Plan activities to meet enterprise goals

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
I think it is B.

questions.question_text: Which activity should be done by governance?

Identify the missing word in the following sentence.
The definition of (?) is a collection of practices influenced by the enterprise's policies and procedures that takes input from a number of sources, manipulates the inputs and produces outputs.

discussion.content: Answer D, Components of the Governance System

choices.D: Focusing on quick wins and improvements
choices.C: Tailoring COBIT to fit the unique context of the enterprise
choices.A: Effective communication of the necessary changes

questions.question_text: Which option is an environmental factor which the enterprise is dependent upon when designing its implementation plan?
